item.title: What is the price of silver today: February 5, 2026?
item.description: Considering a silver investment in today's economic climate? Here's where the price stands as of February 5, 2026.

item.title: Washington Post begins sweeping layoffs as it scales back news coverage
item.description: Former WaPo executive editor Martin Baron told CBS News the paper's coverage will be "dramatically diminished" because of the job cuts.

item.title: Bio lab found in Las Vegas is similar to California scene, officials say
item.description: Officials in Reedley, California said they had tried to warn federal authorities about the possibility of similar labs after one was found there in 20...

item.title: Russia says huge meteorite chunk discovered before being smuggled to U.K.
item.description: Russia's customs service says a 2.8-ton chunk of the Aletai meteorite was found in a shipping container, labeled as a garden ornament.

item.title: Criminals plot to sack Super Bowl fans for a loss with these online scams
item.description: Lawmakers are warning Americans to beware the many financial scams linked to Super Bowl LX, from fake betting sites to counterfeit tickets.
